channel.title: Pivot, Tisfat, EZToon, Animation
channel.description:
Who Agrees That We Should Have A Cartoon Animation Section On These FOrums, I MEan Watchen Uhmm Is Fun And All, But Postin uhmm Is Way Better!, Am I Right So , Admins\Mods Please Make A Cartoon Category And Add These Boards
Pivot Anims Tisfat Anims EZToon Anims Flash Anims
That Will Be All, Ty
-~(LoveScaper)~-

item.title: Pivot, Tisfat, EZToon, Animation
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

LoveScaper:

Lol, Does AnyOne ELSE Have Anything To Say About My Typing…

Yes, I do. It’s not proper english, and in a way it would therefore be against the rules. But there’s just no reason to type like that.
I don’t even bother reading posts when they are capitalized like that because it hurts my eyes so much it isn’t worth the effort.

Anyways, I do not think it would be a good idea because a board filled with Pivot animations would quickly become a spam board. I can just picture everyone posting a thread for every pivot animation they make that all are the exact same(shitty) and if you think you have some animations worth showing off then you can just make a thread in the grahpics section and contain all your animations in there.

Read full topic
